Description_lang: Increases the damage done by your Shield of the Righteous by $m1%, but reduces armor granted by $m2%.

description_blz.en_US: Increases the damage done by your Shield of the Righteous by 30%, but reduces armor granted by 30%.
description_blz.es_MX: Aumenta un 30% el daño infligido por tu Escudo del honrado, pero reduce un 30% la armadura que otorga.
description_blz.pt_BR: Aumenta em 30% o dano causado pelo seu Escudo do Íntegro, mas reduz em 30% a armadura concedida.
description_blz.de_DE: Erhöht den verursachten Schaden Eures Zaubers 'Schild der Rechtschaffenen' um 30%, verringert jedoch die gewährte Rüstung um 30%.
description_blz.en_GB: Increases the damage done by your Shield of the Righteous by 30%, but reduces armor granted by 30%.
description_blz.es_ES: Aumenta el daño infligido por tu Escudo del honrado un 30%, pero reduce la armadura que otorga un 30%.
description_blz.fr_FR: Augmente les dégâts de Bouclier du vertueux de 30%, mais réduit l’Armure octroyée de 30%.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta i danni inflitti da Scudo del Virtuoso del 30%, ma ne riduce l'armatura fornita del 30%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Увеличивает урон от "Щита праведника" на 30%, но снижает эффективность усиления брони на 30%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 정의의 방패의 공격력이 30%만큼 증가하지만 증가하는 방어도가 30%만큼 감소합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 你的公正之盾造成的傷害提高30%，但賦予的護盾值降低30%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 你的正义盾击造成的伤害提高30%，但获得的护甲降低30%。
